venue.name: Flatbread Pizza Company @ Sacco's Bowl Haven

item.description: Chow down on pizza while bowling on Tuesday, September 28th from 5-10 PM at the Flatbread Pizza Company[/b] in Somerville, MA. A percentage of the proceeds from each pizza sold will be donated to help support Waypoint Adventure, a nonprofit that provides outdoor adventures for people with disabilities. A variety of homemade desserts will also be on sale with benefits going directly to Waypoint. Information regarding participation in Waypoint Adventure programs and volunteering will also be available.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have an Ex-Southerners sign and I can give you my cell phone number if you like.
item.name: Pizza and Bowling for Charity
